text: This is a list of Number 1 singles in 1996 in New Zealand, starting with the first chart dated, January 12, 1996. == Summary == === Chart === Date Artist Single 12 January Coolio featuring LV "Gangsta's Paradise" 19 January Mariah Carey & Boyz II Men "One Sweet Day" 26 January OMC "How Bizarre" 2 February OMC "How Bizarre" 9 February OMC "How Bizarre" 16 February CDB "Let's Groove" 23 February CDB "Let's Groove" 1 March CDB "Let's Groove" 8 March Oasis "Wonderwall" 15 March Peter Andre "Mysterious Girl" 22 March Peter Andre "Mysterious Girl" 29 March L.A.D. title: List of number-one singles in 1996 (New Zealand)
